snippet: The crucible of a presidential campaign is seldom considered an asset to the health and well-being of a candidate’s family. The Bushes, of course, are not an ordinary family.
abstract: The crucible of a presidential campaign is seldom considered an asset to the health and well-being of a candidate’s family. The Bushes, of course, are not an ordinary family.

headline.main: Jeb Bush Says Campaign Attacks on Him Are Keeping His Ailing Father Strong
